sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"选择"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: choose, select, elect, pick, prefer, opt
means: choose ： 普通用词，侧重根据个人意愿和判断从众多的对象中进行选择，着重被选者的优点。
select ： 书面用词，具有庄严、正式的感情色彩。强调精选。
elect ： 指按照一定的规章或法律，用投票等方式进行的认真慎重的选择。
pick ： 口语用词，多指从个人角度仔细挑选，也含任意挑选之意。
prefer ： 强调个人偏爱，不一定有选择的行动。
opt ： 多指在几种可能性之间进行选择。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"极好的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: excellent, choice, splendid, select, prime, first-rate
means: excellent ： 通常指事物在等级品位以及职位级别等方面的最优或接近最优。
choice ： 指通过精心挑选达到水平，尤指罕见或品质精良的商品。
splendid ： 口语常用词，指非常令人满意，显得完美无缺。
select ： 指精挑细选出来作为范例的物或人。
prime ： 常指最重要、价值最高的东西，也可以表示最佳、最典型或最高的人或物。
first-rate ： 多用于指对抽象事物的主观评估，有时含夸大、自负的意味。

sentence.Network_en: The floorcovering you select will need to be impervious to water.
sentence.Network_cn: 挑选的地板材料必须是防水的。

sentence.Network_en: A ferocious battle to select a new parliamentary candidate is in progress.
sentence.Network_cn: 推选一位新的议会候选人的激战正酣。

sentence.Network_en: Christian Lacroix is throwing a very lavish and very select party.
sentence.Network_cn: 克里斯汀·拉克鲁瓦正在举办一个非常豪华的上流聚会。

可选择性(selectivity)：比较一下列中唯一键的数量和表中的行数，就可以判断该列的可选择性。如果该列的”唯一键的数量/表中的行数…

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin select- 'chosen', from the verb seligere, from se- 'apart' + legere 'choose'

encyclopedia.content: 英文select【si'lekt】。 中文意思为选择、挑选。这还是一条计算机SQL数据库中中常用的函数。在网页HTML中的select是个选择对象。

entry.def: If you select something, you choose it from a number of things of the same kind.

example.ex: Voters are selecting candidates for both US Senate seats and for 52 congressional seats...
example.tran: 选民正在为美国参议院议席和 52 个众议院议席挑选候选人。

example.ex: With a difficult tee shot, select a club which will keep you short of the trouble...
example.tran: 开球难度较大时，选一根好使的高尔夫球杆。

entry.tran: (在屏幕上)选定(某文件或某段文本以作特别处理)
entry.def: If you select a file or a piece of text on a computer screen, you click on it so that it is marked in a different colour, usually in order for you to give the computer an instruction relating to that file or piece of text.

example.ex: I selected a file and pressed the Delete key.
example.tran: 我选定了一个文件，按下了删除键。

entry.tran: 精选的;作为…精华的;优等的
entry.def: A select group is a small group of some of the best people or things of their kind.

example.ex: He was one of the small select group assembled by Penney, at the High Explosive Research centre.
example.tran: 他是彭尼在烈性炸药研究中心召集的精英小组的一员。

entry.tran: 第一流的;只为富人(或上层人士)而设的;高级的
entry.def: If you describe something as select, you mean it has many desirable features, but is available only to people who have a lot of money or who belong to a high social class.

example.ex: Christian Lacroix is throwing a very lavish and very select party.
example.tran: 克里斯汀·拉克鲁瓦正在举办一个非常豪华的上流聚会。

example.ex: ...a meeting of a very select club.

means.word_mean: 1. pick out, select, or choose from a number of alternatives;

sentences.sentence: "Choose a good husband for your daughter"
"She selected a pair of shoes from among the dozen the salesgirl had shown her"

means.word_mean: 2. selected or chosen for special qualifications;

stems_affixes.word_buile: se分开,离开,区别开+clus关闭+ive……的→喜欢把自己关起来→隐居的
sed=se分开,离开,区别开+it走+ion表名词→分开走→煽动叛乱
se分开,离开,区别开+ced走+e→走开→退出
se分开,离开,区别开+clud关闭+e→分开关→隐居的
se分开,离开,区别开+cret区别+e→分辨开→分泌;藏起来
se分开,离开,区别开+duce引→引开→勾引别人
se分开,离开,区别开+greg群+ate表动词→和人群分开→隔离
se分开,离开,区别开+lect选→选出分开
se分开,离开,区别开+ver分开→分离开→切断
collect[v.收集]+ive……的→adj.集体的,共同的 n.集体

stems_affixes.value_cn: 智力的,理智的,有理解力的

collect[v.收集]+ion表名词→n.收藏[品],收集[物]
collect[v.收集]+ive……的→adj.集体的,共同的 n.集体
elect[v.选举,推选;选择,作出选择]+ion表名词→n.选举,选择权;当选

intel=inter在……中间+lect选择,收集→在中间选出的人→智者
intellect[n.理智,智力,才智]+ual……的→n.知识分子 adj.智力的,理智的,有理解力的
recollect[v.回忆,想起,记起,忆起,记得]+ion表名词→n.回忆
select[v.选出]+ion表名词→n.选择,挑选;选集,精选物
acro高+lect讲,读,说→高层说的话
dia对着+lect讲,读,说→两个对着说→方言
idio个人的+lect说→个人说的话
neg没有+lect选择,收集→没有选出→疏忽
lect讲,读,说+ure表名词→n.&v.演讲,讲课
col共同+lect选择→放在一起选择→收集

stems_affixes.value_cn: 选举,推选;选择,作出选择

se分开+lect选→选出分开

Sentence.sentence: And it includes alternative schools with students selected by lottery(抽签),such as H-B Wood lawn in Arlington, Va.
We select our food very particularly.
Perhaps they prefer going into a nursing home and can select one in advance.
But that may have more to do with their ability to select the best students.
Professor Gauthier believes schools should not just be selecting candidates from traditional sectors such as banking, consultancy and industry.
At the moment candidates are selected on a fairly narrow set of criteria such as prior academic and career performance, and analytical and problem solving abilities.

sentences.en: They selected a diamond engagement ring.
sentences.cn: 他们挑选了一枚钻石订婚戒指。

sentences.en: Which place in the world would you select as your perfect home?
sentences.cn: 你选择世界上的什么地方作为你最理想的安家之地呢?

sentences.en: We selected her to represent us.
sentences.cn: 我们选她作为我们的代表。

means.word_mean: 精选的；挑选出来的；作为…精华的；优等的

sentences.en: The captain needs a select crew for this dangerous voyage.
sentences.cn: 船长需要一批精选的水手来作此危险的航行。

sentences.en: The book is a select collection of poetry from various authors.
sentences.cn: 这本书是各家诗作的集锦。

means.word_mean: 限制性的, 选择严格的

sentences.cn: 那所学校招生非常严格。

sentences.en: She was very select in people she invites.
sentences.cn: 她邀请的客人都要经过严格挑选。

jushi.english: Why didn't you select a nice subject?
jushi.chinese: 你为什么没选一个好题目?

jushi.english: They selected a diamond engagement ring.
jushi.chinese: 他们挑选了一枚钻石订婚戒指。
